output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - The post directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 on the official list).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement - Targets a large estimated audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Addresses the general public in Bihor county - Uses public communication style
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Promotes achievements under Ciolacu's government - Uses PSD party hashtags - Highlights positive administrative achievements - Links these achievements directly to Marcel Ciolacu's leadership
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - It's a promotional message with clear political affiliation - Contains party hashtags and CMF number - Presents information in a promotional rather than journalistic manner

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Uses party hashtags (#PSD) - Is a paid advertisement - Links achievements to political leadership - Presents political accomplishments in a promotional way
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala (post Facebook ID: 1072866431252300) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Materialul promoveaza direct candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU, folosind CMF 11240017, hashtag-uri de partid (#PSD) si prezentand realizari administrative in scop electoral. Postarea este promovata ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind interdictia propagandei electorale dupa incheierea campaniei.
